Rep. Jack Bergman (R-Mich.) was the programâ€™s top spender last year. He was reimbursed more than $32,000 for lodging and nearly $12,000 for meals in 2023, according to data released by the House as of Tuesday.


```{r}
reimbursement_expenses <- read.csv("congress_data.csv")
```


```{r}
top_reimbursement_expenses <- reimbursement_expenses |>
  filter(FISCAL.YEAR.OR.LEGISLATIVE.YEAR == "LY2023") |>
  group_by(ORGANIZATION) |>
  summarise(
    AMOUNT = sum(AMOUNT)
  ) |>
  arrange(desc(AMOUNT))
```
